## What are packages?

Packages are one the killer features of R and one of the key elements of the language's success. Rather than having a software company hire coders to develop new capabilities, R encourages users to develop their own. There was no support for the chain ladder reserving method in R when it was originally built, but there is now, thanks to the `ChainLadder` package.
